name: Bell Blaster
description:
There's only one good way to ring a bell, and that's by shooting them with cannonballs!

How to play:

  • Click and drag with your mouse or your finger to move the view around
  • You can switch to Aim Mode with the bottom left button to line up your shot
  • Press the Fire button to shoot a cannonball
  • If you knock the bell off the platform, you earn points
  • If you miss, you lose points
  • Tip: Try to account for the trajectory of the cannonball; it won't always go where the targeting reticule shows because physics!
  • Try to get the highest score!

This is a fully 3D game that supports both desktop and mobile browsers. Built using BabylonJS.
